alert.note: Alert for Cowley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 27 at 8:18AM CDT until May 29 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Arkansas River at Arkansas City affecting Cowley County. Arkansas River at Oxford affecting Sumner County. For the Arkansas River...including Oxford, Arkansas City...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River at Arkansas City. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, The Water Plant takes precautions on water well pump houses west of the Arkansas River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 12.0 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.7 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Arkansas River Arkansas City 11.0 12.0 Fri 8 am CDT 12.4 9.5 7.5 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
